document_data.name: Sunfire
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sunfire''''', also known as '''''At'ar's fire''''', was a [[spell]] used by wizards in [[Anauroch]] and [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Effects: This spell harnessed the power of the sun to create an explosive ball of flame. Most creatures killed by this spell were burned to ash. This spell was similar to a ''[[fireball]]'' spell with the exception that the caster, and all of his or her gear, were immune to the flames.
document_data.Components: This spell required a ball of sticky gum to cast.
